Class PandemicModel

  • public class PandemicModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will provide the canvas for the animation

    • Field Summary

      private javafx.scene.chart.XYChart.Series<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Number> chartNumInfected
      Chart data has to be of type XYChart.Series due to JavaFX charts requiring an ObservableList, which is a type of List which keeps track of updates, this is used for easily updating the data for the chart

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void create_threads()
      Method for creating the threads, wrapper classes Timer and AnimationTimer used, due to scheduling needs and JavaFX GUI requirements Workload will be separated between two threads, one for GUI and another for the simulation
      private void fillConstants()
      Fills the Constants instance with data from the PandemicController
      City getCity()  
      Constants getConstants()  
      private void paint​(javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas)
      Function that will be called every tick per delay time, it will be used for painting the canvas based on the data from a City instance
      private void update()
      Method that updates all the variables from the City instance data structure.

      • chartNumInfected

        private final javafx.scene.chart.XYChart.Series<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Number> chartNumInfected
        Chart data has to be of type XYChart.Series due to JavaFX charts requiring an ObservableList, which is a type of List which keeps track of updates, this is used for easily updating the data for the chart

      • create_threads

        private void create_threads()
        Method for creating the threads, wrapper classes Timer and AnimationTimer used, due to scheduling needs and JavaFX GUI requirements Workload will be separated between two threads, one for GUI and another for the simulation

        private void update_chart()

      • fillConstants

        private void fillConstants()
        Fills the Constants instance with data from the PandemicController

      • paint

        private void paint​(javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas)
        Function that will be called every tick per delay time, it will be used for painting the canvas based on the data from a City instance
        Parameters:
        canvas - A kind of panel that will be used for painting

        private void update()
        Method that updates all the variables from the City instance data structure.
